title: O.C.D XI 26th-30th may, register!! we are full!

posts.content:
TJW964 wrote:Anyone travelling down from the Midlands (down the M5 from J2 or J4) on Thursday?


Yes a few of us are, some from Lincolnshire area and then us lot from Leicestershire. We are meeting up with the Lincolnshire lot at the Hopwood Services on the M42 @ 10.30am. We will then join the M5 and carry on down until J27.
Really looking forward to it, see you at 9.30 david!!

author.location: Essex but I'm nothing like the twats on the telly.

posts.content:
We're leaving sunny Essex early doors(and by early I mean 4am-ish) to avoid the nightmare M25 car-park with a view to getting as far as we can, maybe Delamare or Gordano, or until I start falling asleep then having a few hour kip then carry on to J27.
Crooooooooooooooze!!!!!!!

Shalom, Lee

Pucka wrote:
TJW964 wrote:Anyone travelling down from the Midlands (down the M5 from J2 or J4) on Thursday?


Yes a few of us are, some from Lincolnshire area and then us lot from Leicestershire. We are meeting up with the Lincolnshire lot at the Hopwood Services on the M42 @ 10.30am. We will then join the M5 and carry on down until J27.



Will be in the area so will hope to hook up with you all on the way down the m5. Will pm my phone number.

Cheers
Trevor

rikki james wrote:Whats the weather forecast like?


Not looking great for Thursday. Wet and about 14 degrees.
Friday will be windy, and about 13 degrees.
Didn't bother seeing what Sat/Sun will be like.

Bring a coat and a happy face and it'll be great! See ya there.

Hi Sean, We'll be pulling into Gordano's 'bout 12.06 for a coffee if you wanna meet and do the slap down to J27 together ?
Anyone else for Gordano's?
Pucka, you should be passing Gordano's 'bout midday-ish if you're picking up the M5 at M42 connection at 10.30

flatbeat wrote:Hi Sean, We'll be pulling into Gordano's 'bout 12.06 for a coffee if you wanna meet and do the slap down to J27 together ?
Anyone else for Gordano's?
Pucka, you should be passing Gordano's 'bout midday-ish if you're picking up the M5 at M42 connection at 10.30


Sounds good, will PM you my mobile sir!
A few of us have CB's if any of you lot do as well we will be on channel 16, roger that

flatbeat wrote:Hi Sean, We'll be pulling into Gordano's 'bout 12.06 for a coffee if you wanna meet and do the slap down to J27 together ?
Anyone else for Gordano's?
Pucka, you should be passing Gordano's 'bout midday-ish if you're picking up the M5 at M42 connection at 10.30


Nigel, that sounds great. I'll see you there at noon. We'll need to be on the road by 1ish, but that gives plenty of time for others to roll in!

Pucka wrote:
TJW964 wrote:Anyone travelling down from the Midlands (down the M5 from J2 or J4) on Thursday?


Yes a few of us are, some from Lincolnshire area and then us lot from Leicestershire. We are meeting up with the Lincolnshire lot at the Hopwood Services on the M42 @ 10.30am. We will then join the M5 and carry on down until J27.


Hope to join up with you at Hopwood. Are you meeting at 10:30 or leaving at 10:30 or both?

Cheers

Steve

Hope to join up with you at Hopwood. Are you meeting at 10:30 or leaving at 10:30 or both?

Steve


Hey Steve, your welcome to join us, the more the merrier

We aim to get to the services for 10.30.... hopefully leave shortly afterwards. Its just over an hour away for us but about 2 hours for the Lincolnshire lot so we are aiming to get the timings about right

johnny k wrote:Chewie....
Strictly no cream teas.
keep your eyes on the Road.



Can't beat a quality Devon cream tea!!

Anyone else for Gordano's?
Pucka, you should be passing Gordano's 'bout midday-ish if you're picking up the M5 at M42 connection at 10.30


Nigel, that sounds great. I'll see you there at noon. We'll need to be on the road by 1ish, but that gives plenty of time for others to roll in!
Looking forward to it. Leaving by 1pm's about right and as you say, that leaves plenty of time for the 'Pucka Collective' and others to get there.

Drive safe peoples

i have just recy'd the road from lincs .... it all looks good to go!!

drive safe!
